  • Element
javax.mail

Annotation Type MailSessionDefinition


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface MailSessionDefinition
    J2EE annotation to define a mail session for registration with JNDI.
    Since:
    1.5

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String name
      JNDI name to register the session.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      Description of this session.
      java.lang.String from
      From address for the user.
      java.lang.String host
      Server hostname.
      java.lang.String password
      Password.
      java.lang.String[] properties
      Properties to include in the session, in the format name=value.
      java.lang.String storeProtocol
      Store protocol.
      java.lang.String transportProtocol
      Transport protocol.
      java.lang.String user
      Username.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        JNDI name to register the session.

        Description of this session.
        Default:
        ""

        public abstract java.lang.String storeProtocol
